text: Conveniently located near Raffles Place MRT Station, this church has a friendly community. Its welcoming and spiritual environment makes it ideal for worship and personal growth.

I am blessed in  this church coz the teaching is base on a Bible.
I'm thankful to God he brought me here.
God bless everyone..

With faithful expository preaching from God's Word, sound teaching and warm fellowship, here is an excellent church that adheres to the Westminster Standards. This is not a church that seeks to tickle your ears with what you want to hear. This is not a church that makes you feel comfortable in your sins, apathy and lukewarmness. After all, this is not a fast food restaurant or a Mac-Church. If you want to grow in your spiritual walk, then this church might be for you.
Come to hear Godâ€™s faithful words being preached.
